precontext: The team gathered in a dimly lit room to discuss the next phase of their project. Everyone knew that their work required secrecy and careful planning. They needed to make adjustments to ensure everything went smoothly.
sentence: There was a suggestion that they should move underground for the next stage of the process.
meanings_considered: under the level of the ground
conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
explanation:
• The precontext emphasizes secrecy and careful planning, making the figurative "underground" meaning (hidden operations) highly plausible.  
• The literal "underground" (beneath the ground) is inconsistent with the setting described—a dimly lit room discussing a secret project—where physical underground infrastructure is not implied.  
• The phrase "move underground" in a context of secrecy naturally aligns with the metaphorical sense of covert operations, not a physical relocation beneath the earth.
clear_meaning_text: conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
